<structured_notes>
    <project_name>Comprehensive Test Project 20251105_113858</project_name>
    <company_overview>Not specified</company_overview>
    <attendees>
        <attendee>Unspecified Speaker (Project Lead)</attendee>
        <attendee>Sarah (Team Member/Technical Lead)</attendee>
    </attendees>
    <meeting_date>Not specified</meeting_date>
    <meeting_objective>To plan and define the requirements for a comprehensive project management system.</meeting_objective>
    <key_discussion_points>
        <point>Core features: task management, team collaboration, real-time updates, analytics dashboard.</point>
        <point>Technology stack selection: React, Node.js, PostgreSQL.</point>
        <point>User authentication and role-based access control (RBAC).</point>
        <point>Database design approach: relational (PostgreSQL) vs. NoSQL.</point>
        <point>Real-time notifications and mobile-responsive design requirements.</point>
        <point>API integrations with third-party tools like Slack and Microsoft Teams.</point>
        <point>Using Redis for caching and real-time features.</point>
    </key_discussion_points>
    <pain_points>
        <pain_point>Lack of a centralized, comprehensive project management system.</pain_point>
        <pain_point>Need for improved real-time collaboration and updates among team members.</pain_point>
    </pain_points>
    <requirements>
        <requirement>Task management functionality.</requirement>
        <requirement>Team collaboration tools.</requirement>
        <requirement>Real-time updates and notifications.</requirement>
        <requirement>Analytics dashboard.</requirement>
        <requirement>User authentication and authorization.</requirement>
        <requirement>Role-based access control with roles: Admin, Project Manager, Team Member.</requirement>
        <requirement>Mobile-responsive design.</requirement>
        <requirement>API integrations with Slack and Microsoft Teams.</requirement>
    </requirements>
    <decisions_made>
        <decision>Frontend will be built using React.</decision>
        <decision>Backend will be built using Node.js.</decision>
        <decision>Primary database will be PostgreSQL.</decision>
        <decision>System will implement role-based access control (RBAC).</decision>
        <decision>A relational database approach (PostgreSQL) was chosen over NoSQL.</decision>
        <decision>Redis will be used for caching and real-time features.</decision>
    </decisions_made>
    <action_items>Not specified</action_items>
    <technical_constraints>
        <constraint>System must be scalable.</constraint>
        <constraint>System must be secure.</constraint>
        <constraint>System must be user-friendly.</constraint>
        <constraint>Must support a mobile-responsive design.</constraint>
    </technical_constraints>
    <stakeholders>
        <stakeholder>Admin</stakeholder>
        <stakeholder>Project Manager</stakeholder>
        <stakeholder>Team Member</stakeholder>
        <stakeholder>Sarah (Team Member/Technical Lead)</stakeholder>
        <stakeholder>Unspecified Speaker (Project Lead)</stakeholder>
    </stakeholders>
</structured_notes>

industry_trends: Research unavailable - proceeding with general best practices

use_cases.title: Create and Manage Tasks with AI Assistance
use_cases.description: A user creates a new task within a project, assigning it to team members, setting due dates, and providing details. The system leverages AI to suggest assignees, due dates, and parse natural language inputs to streamline task creation.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has access to the project. The project workspace is open.
main_flow: User navigates to the project's task board or list.
User clicks the 'Add Task' or '+' button.
User enters a task title in natural language (e.g., 'Finalize Q4 marketing report by Friday').
AI model parses the input and pre-fills the 'Title' and 'Due Date' fields.
AI suggests potential assignees based on task content and team roles.
User reviews AI suggestions, makes any necessary adjustments, and adds a detailed description or attachments.
User clicks 'Save' or 'Create Task'.
System validates the data and creates the task.
The new task appears in real-time on all collaborators' views.
A notification is sent to the assigned user(s).

alternate_flows.name: Manual Task Creation
alternate_flows.description: If the user does not use natural language input, they manually fill in all fields including title, description, assignee, and due date without AI suggestions.

alternate_flows.name: AI Suggestion Rejection
alternate_flows.description: The user can override any AI-suggested assignee or due date and select different options from the available lists.

use_cases.postconditions: A new task is successfully created and stored in the database. The task is visible to all project members with appropriate permissions. Assigned users are notified.
use_cases.business_value: Significantly reduces the time and cognitive load required for task creation, leading to faster project initiation and improved data consistency. AI assistance enhances user experience and adoption.

use_cases.title: Receive AI-Powered Workload and Prioritization Insights
use_cases.description: A user views their personalized dashboard to get an AI-generated summary of their tasks, prioritized by urgency and importance. The system provides insights into potential bottlenecks and suggests an optimal order for task completion.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in. The user has been assigned tasks across one or more projects.
main_flow: User logs into the application and is directed to their personal dashboard.
System displays an 'AI Insights' widget.
The widget lists the top 3-5 prioritized tasks for the day, with a brief rationale for each (e.g., 'High priority due to upcoming deadline and dependency for Team B').
System provides a visual indicator of the user's current workload (e.g., 'You are at 80% capacity this week').
User can click on any suggested task to navigate directly to its details.

alternate_flows.name: No Tasks Assigned
alternate_flows.description: If the user has no active tasks, the dashboard displays a message indicating a clear schedule and may suggest exploring unassigned tasks or proactive work.

use_cases.postconditions: The user is equipped with clear, data-driven guidance on how to focus their efforts for maximum productivity.
use_cases.business_value: Increases individual productivity and reduces decision fatigue. Helps prevent burnout by managing workload visibility and ensures critical tasks are addressed promptly, directly impacting project timelines.

use_cases.title: Collaborate in Real-Time on a Task
use_cases.description: Multiple users simultaneously view and interact with a single task's details. This includes adding comments, updating status, attaching files, and seeing each other's changes in real-time, fostering seamless collaboration.
use_cases.preconditions: Multiple users are logged in. They have the task open in their respective interfaces.
main_flow: User A opens a task detail view.
User B, who is also assigned or following the task, opens the same task detail view.
User A adds a comment in the discussion thread.
The comment instantly appears on User B's screen without requiring a refresh.
User B attaches a file to the task.
The file attachment is immediately visible to User A.
User A changes the task status from 'In Progress' to 'Ready for Review'.
The status change is reflected in real-time for User B and on the main project board for all relevant team members.

alternate_flows.name: Intermittent Connectivity
alternate_flows.description: If a user's connection is lost, their changes are queued locally and synchronized with the server once connectivity is restored, with conflict resolution prompts if necessary.

use_cases.postconditions: All users have a consistent, up-to-date view of the task's state and history. A record of all interactions is saved.
use_cases.business_value: Eliminates communication delays and version control issues common in asynchronous collaboration. This accelerates problem-solving and decision-making, which is critical for agile workflows.

use_cases.title: Authenticate via Single Sign-On (SSO) using OAuth 2.0
use_cases.description: A new or existing user logs into the application using their corporate credentials (e.g., Google Workspace, Microsoft 365) through a secure OAuth 2.0 flow, without needing to create a separate password for this application.
use_cases.actors: User, System, External Identity Provider (e.g., Google, Microsoft)
use_cases.preconditions: The application is configured with the necessary OAuth 2.0 client credentials for the chosen identity provider.
main_flow: User navigates to the application's login page.
User clicks the 'Login with Google' (or other provider) button.
Application redirects the user's browser to the Google authentication endpoint.
User enters their Google credentials (if not already logged in to Google) and consents to share their profile information with the application.
Google redirects the user back to the application with an authorization code.
Application's backend securely exchanges the authorization code for an access token.
System uses the access token to fetch the user's profile information (email, name).
System authenticates the user and creates a session. If the user is new, a user account is automatically provisioned.
User is redirected to their application dashboard, now logged in.

alternate_flows.name: User Denies Access
alternate_flows.description: If the user denies the consent screen on the identity provider's page, they are redirected back to the application with an error message, and they are not logged in.

use_cases.postconditions: The user is securely authenticated and has an active session within the application.
use_cases.business_value: Enhances security by delegating authentication to trusted providers. Improves user experience by reducing password friction and simplifies user management for IT administrators, leading to faster enterprise adoption.

use_cases.title: Generate and Export Project Reports via REST API
use_cases.description: A project manager or an external business intelligence (BI) tool programmatically requests a summary report for a specific project by calling a secured REST API endpoint. The system aggregates data and returns it in a structured JSON format.
use_cases.actors: Project Manager, External System (e.g., Power BI, Tableau)
use_cases.preconditions: The actor has a valid API token or is authenticated via OAuth 2.0 with scopes for 'report:read'. The project exists.
main_flow: Actor makes an authenticated GET request to an endpoint like `/api/v1/projects/{projectId}/reports`.
API request includes optional query parameters (e.g., `startDate`, `endDate`, `groupBy=assignee`).
The system validates the authentication token and the user's permissions to access the project data.
The backend logic queries the PostgreSQL database for tasks, time logs, and comments within the specified criteria.
System calculates metrics (e.g., tasks completed, average cycle time, burndown chart data).
System formats the aggregated data into a JSON object.
API returns a `200 OK` status with the JSON report in the response body.

alternate_flows.name: Invalid Project ID or Permissions
alternate_flows.description: If the project ID is invalid or the user lacks permissions, the API returns a `404 Not Found` or `403 Forbidden` error, respectively.

use_cases.postconditions: The requesting actor receives a current, machine-readable report of the project's status.
use_cases.business_value: Enables seamless integration with existing enterprise systems and custom dashboards. Facilitates data-driven decision-making by allowing for automated, on-demand reporting without manual data export.

use_cases.title: Receive AI-Generated Project Health Summary
use_cases.description: A project manager views a project-level dashboard that features an AI-generated narrative summary of the project's overall health, highlighting key achievements, potential risks, and recommendations for mitigation.
use_cases.preconditions: The project has been active for a sufficient period to generate data (e.g., at least one week).
main_flow: Project Manager navigates to the main dashboard for a specific project.
System displays an 'AI Project Health' widget.

The widget contains a concise, natural-language summary (e.g., 'Project Alpha is on track. The design phase is 90% complete, a key achievement. However, risk of delay is identified in the development backlog, which is growing by 5 tasks per day. Recommendation: Re-allocate one resource from QA to development to address the bottleneck.').
Key metrics and trends are visually represented alongside the summary (e.g., chart of task creation vs. completion rate).
Manager can click on highlighted risks or recommendations to see the underlying data or take action (e.g., re-assign a task).

alternate_flows.name: Insufficient Data
alternate_flows.description: If the project is too new, the widget displays a message indicating that the AI is still learning and will provide insights once enough data is collected.

use_cases.postconditions: The Project Manager has a high-level, easily digestible understanding of project status and actionable intelligence.
use_cases.business_value: Proactively identifies risks and provides actionable insights, enabling managers to move from reactive problem-solving to proactive project steering. This saves significant time and improves project success rates.

business_requirements.overview: The 'Comprehensive Test Project' aims to develop a cloud-first, AI-powered task management and team collaboration platform. The system will be built on a modern technology stack (React, Node.js, PostgreSQL) and will adhere to industry best practices for security and integration, including OAuth 2.0 for authentication and REST APIs for extensibility. The core value proposition is to enhance team productivity and project predictability through intelligent automation and real-time collaboration features.
business_goals: Increase team productivity by 20% through AI-assisted task prioritization and automation.
Improve project on-time delivery rates by providing proactive, AI-driven risk insights to managers.
Achieve a high user adoption rate (target: 80% of target teams actively using the platform weekly within 6 months of launch).
Establish the platform as a competitive offering in the market by integrating modern AI capabilities and a superior user experience.
Ensure enterprise-grade security and scalability to support large organizations.
success_criteria: User Engagement: Daily Active Users (DAU) to Monthly Active Users (MAU) ratio greater than 40%.
Productivity Metric: Measured reduction in the average time-to-completion for standard tasks.
User Satisfaction: Net Promoter Score (NPS) of +40 or higher in post-launch surveys.
System Reliability: Achieve 99.9% uptime, as measured by third-party monitoring services.
Feature Adoption: 60% of users engage with at least one AI-powered feature (e.g., smart suggestions, insights) weekly.
constraints: Technology Stack: The frontend must be developed using React, the backend using Node.js, and the database must be PostgreSQL.
Security Standards: All user authentication must be handled via OAuth 2.0, supporting major identity providers. All data must be encrypted in transit (TLS 1.2+) and at rest.
API Standards: The system must expose a comprehensive, versioned, and documented REST API (e.g., following OpenAPI 3.0 specification).
Cloud-First Deployment: The application must be designed for deployment on a major cloud provider (AWS, Azure, or GCP) to leverage scalability and managed services.
Timeline: The Minimum Viable Product (MVP) must be launched within the next 9 months.
Budget: Development and operational costs must not exceed the allocated project budget.
assumptions: Target users have a reliable and consistent internet connection suitable for a real-time web application.
Users are familiar with modern SaaS collaboration tools (e.g., Slack, Asana, Jira) and their interaction patterns.
A suitable third-party AI/ML service (e.g., OpenAI, Google AI Platform) will be available and can be integrated within budget and technical constraints.
A dedicated DevOps team will be responsible for the setup, maintenance, and security of the cloud infrastructure.
The organization will provide necessary support for change management and user training to drive adoption.

risks.mitigation: Start with a well-defined, narrow set of AI features for the MVP. Use established third-party APIs with clear documentation rather than building models from scratch initially. Allocate buffer time in the development schedule for AI-related R&D.

Involve a pilot group of users early in the design and testing process to gather feedback. Ensure the user interface is exceptionally intuitive. Develop a comprehensive onboarding and training program.

Adhere to a 'security-by-design' principle. Conduct regular third-party security audits and penetration testing. Ensure compliance with data protection regulations like GDPR and CCPA. Implement strict access controls.
Design the architecture for horizontal scalability from the start. Implement a robust caching strategy. Conduct load testing and performance tuning before major releases.
Where possible, design an abstraction layer to allow for switching providers. Monitor service level agreements (SLAs) and have a clear incident response plan for provider outages.

data.brd_xml:
<businessRequirementsDocument>
    <title>BRD for Comprehensive Test Project 20251105_113858</title>
    <executiveSummary>The Comprehensive Test Project 20251105_113858 aims to develop an AI-powered project management and collaboration platform that enhances team productivity through intelligent task management, real-time collaboration, and data-driven insights. The system will leverage artificial intelligence to streamline task creation, provide workload prioritization, and generate project health summaries. Key objectives include reducing task creation time by 50%, improving team collaboration efficiency, and enabling seamless integration with enterprise systems through REST APIs and SSO authentication. The platform will deliver measurable business value through increased productivity, reduced decision fatigue, and proactive risk management, ultimately improving project success rates and team satisfaction.</executiveSummary>

    <businessObjectives>
        <primaryObjectives>Develop an AI-powered project management platform that reduces task creation time by 50%, increases team collaboration efficiency by 40%, and provides actionable insights to improve project success rates by 25% within the first 12 months of deployment.</primaryObjectives>
        <keyPerformanceIndicators>
            <kpi name="task_creation_efficiency" target="50% reduction in time" timeframe="6 months" measurement="Time tracking from task initiation to completion">
                <description>Measure the average time users spend creating tasks with AI assistance versus manual entry</description>
            </kpi>
            <kpi name="user_adoption_rate" target="80% active users" timeframe="3 months" measurement="Daily active users / total registered users">
                <description>Track the percentage of registered users who actively use the platform on a daily basis</description>
            </kpi>
            <kpi name="collaboration_velocity" target="40% improvement" timeframe="6 months" measurement="Task completion rate and comment response time">
                <description>Measure the speed of task completion and real-time collaboration effectiveness</description>
            </kpi>
        </keyPerformanceIndicators>
        <successMetrics>
            <metric name="productivity_gain" target="30% increase in team productivity" measurement="Tasks completed per team member per week">
                <trackingMethod>Weekly tracking of task completion rates compared to baseline measurements</trackingMethod>
            </metric>
            <metric name="user_satisfaction" target="4.5/5.0 average rating" measurement="Quarterly user satisfaction surveys">
                <trackingMethod>NPS surveys and in-app feedback collection with monthly analysis</trackingMethod>
            </metric>
        </successMetrics>
    </businessObjectives>

    <stakeholderAnalysis>
        <stakeholder id="STAKEHOLDER-001" name="Project Manager" role="Project Management" influence="High" interest="High">
            <responsibilities>Oversee project execution, manage team resources, monitor project health, and make strategic decisions</responsibilities>
            <requirements>AI-powered project health summaries, real-time task visibility, workload management insights, reporting capabilities</requirements>
            <communicationPlan>Weekly progress reports, monthly stakeholder meetings, ad-hoc alerts for critical issues</communicationPlan>
        </stakeholder>
        <stakeholder id="STAKEHOLDER-002" name="Team Member" role="Development/Operations" influence="Medium" interest="High">
            <responsibilities>Execute assigned tasks, collaborate with team members, update task status, provide feedback</responsibilities>
            <requirements>AI-assisted task creation, workload prioritization, real-time collaboration, mobile access</requirements>
            <communicationPlan>Daily standups, real-time notifications, weekly team retrospectives</communicationPlan>
        </stakeholder>
        <stakeholder id="STAKEHOLDER-003" name="IT Administrator" role="System Administration" influence="High" interest="Medium">
            <responsibilities>Manage system integrations, oversee security, maintain SSO configuration, monitor system performance</responsibilities>
            <requirements>SSO integration, API access, security compliance, system monitoring tools</requirements>
            <communicationPlan>Monthly security reviews, quarterly system updates, emergency incident protocols</communicationPlan>
        </stakeholder>
        <stakeholder id="STAKEHOLDER-004" name="Business Analyst" role="Business Intelligence" influence="Medium" interest="High">
            <responsibilities>Analyze project data, generate reports, provide insights, support decision-making</responsibilities>
            <requirements>REST API access, export capabilities, customizable reports, data visualization</requirements>
            <communicationPlan>Bi-weekly data reviews, monthly business insights reports, on-demand analysis requests</communicationPlan>
        </stakeholder>
        <stakeholder id="STAKEHOLDER-005" name="Executive Sponsor" role="Leadership" influence="High" interest="Medium">
            <responsibilities>Provide strategic direction, approve budgets, ensure organizational alignment, measure ROI</responsibilities>
            <requirements>Executive dashboards, ROI metrics, strategic insights, risk assessments</requirements>
            <communicationPlan>Quarterly business reviews, annual strategic planning, monthly executive summaries</communicationPlan>
        </stakeholder>
    </stakeholderAnalysis>

    <businessRules>
        <rule id="BR-001" name="AI Task Assignment Rules" priority="High">
            <description>AI suggestions for task assignment must be based on team member roles, current workload, skill sets, and historical performance data</description>
            <rationale>Ensures fair and efficient task distribution while maintaining team balance and productivity</rationale>
            <impact>Affects task creation workflow, AI model training data, and team workload algorithms</impact>
            <exceptions>Manual override by project managers, special assignments based on unique requirements</exceptions>
        </rule>
        <rule id="BR-002" name="Real-time Data Synchronization" priority="High">
            <description>All task updates, comments, and status changes must be synchronized across all user sessions within 2 seconds</description>
            <rationale>Maintains data consistency and enables effective real-time collaboration</rationale>
            <impact>Requires WebSocket implementation, conflict resolution mechanisms, and offline sync capabilities</impact>
            <exceptions>Temporary network interruptions handled by queue-and-retry mechanism</exceptions>
        </rule>
        <rule id="BR-003" name="SSO Authentication Policy" priority="High">
            <description>All enterprise users must authenticate through configured SSO providers; local password authentication is disabled for corporate domains</description>
            <rationale>Enhances security and simplifies user management through centralized identity providers</rationitation>
            <impact>Affects user login flow, account provisioning, and security audit trails</impact>
            <exceptions>External contractors may use email/password authentication with admin approval</exceptions>
        </rule>
        <rule id="BR-004" name="API Rate Limiting" priority="Medium">
            <description>API endpoints are limited to 1000 requests per hour per user token to prevent system abuse</description>
            <rationale>Ensures system stability and fair resource allocation among all users</rationale>
            <impact>Requires rate limiting implementation, monitoring, and user notification systems</impact>
            <exceptions>Enterprise partners may request higher limits through formal approval process</exceptions>
        </rule>
        <rule id="BR-005" name="Data Retention Policy" priority="Medium">
            <description>Completed tasks and comments are retained for 7 years; archived projects are stored for 10 years</description>
            <rationale>Complies with data retention regulations and supports business continuity requirements</rationale>
            <impact>Requires automated archiving processes, storage management, and compliance monitoring</impact>
            <exceptions>Legal holds may extend retention periods for specific projects</exceptions>
        </rule>
    </businessRules>

    <processRequirements>
        <process id="PROC-001" name="AI-Powered Task Creation" priority="High">
            <description>Streamlined process for creating tasks with AI assistance to reduce manual data entry and improve accuracy</description>
            <objectives>Reduce task creation time by 50%, improve data consistency, enhance user experience</objectives>
            <steps>
                <step number="1">User initiates task creation from project workspace</step>
                <step number="2">User enters natural language task description</step>
                <step number="3">AI parses input and extracts key information</step>
                <step number="4">System suggests assignees based on role and workload</step>
                <step number="5">AI proposes due dates based on project timeline</step>
                <step number="6">User reviews and modifies suggestions as needed</step>
                <step number="7">System validates all required fields</step>
                <step number="8">Task is created and notifications are sent</step>
            </steps>
            <inputs>Natural language text, project context, user permissions, team member data</inputs>
            <outputs>Created task record, notifications to assignees, updated project metrics</outputs>
            <stakeholders>Team Member, Project Manager, AI System</stakeholders>
        </process>
        <process id="PROC-002" name="Real-time Collaboration" priority="High">
            <description>Enables multiple users to simultaneously work on tasks with instant synchronization</description>
            <objectives>Eliminate communication delays, ensure data consistency, improve team coordination</objectives>
            <steps>
                <step number="1">Multiple users access same task simultaneously</step>
                <step number="2">User A makes changes (comment, status update, file attachment)</step>
                <step number="3">Changes are immediately broadcast to all connected users</step>
                <step number="4">System updates are reflected in real-time on all interfaces</step>
                <step number="5">Conflict resolution handles concurrent edits</step>
                <step number="6">All changes are logged for audit trail</step>
            </steps>
            <inputs>User actions, task data, file attachments, status updates</inputs>
            <outputs>Synchronized task state, real-time notifications, activity logs</outputs>
            <stakeholders>Team Members, Project Manager, System</stakeholders>
        </process>
        <process id="PROC-003" name="API Report Generation" priority="Medium">
            <description>Programmatic generation of project reports for external systems and BI tools</description>
            <objectives>Enable data integration, support automated reporting, facilitate business intelligence</objectives>
            <steps>
                <step number="1">External system authenticates via OAuth 2.0 or API token</step>
                <step number="2">System validates authentication and permissions</step>
                <step number="3">API request is processed with specified parameters</step>
                <step number="4">Database queries aggregate project data</step>
                <step number="5">System calculates metrics and KPIs</step>
                <step number="6">Data is formatted as structured JSON response</step>
                <step number="7">Response is returned with appropriate HTTP status</step>
            </steps>
            <inputs>API requests, authentication tokens, project IDs, query parameters</inputs>
            <outputs>JSON reports, HTTP responses, API usage metrics</outputs>
            <stakeholders>Business Analyst, External Systems, API Gateway</stakeholders>
        </process>
    </processRequirements>

    <dataRequirements>
        <dataEntity id="DATA-001" name="Task">
            <description>Core entity representing work items within projects</description>
            <attributes>
                <attribute name="task_id" type="UUID" required="true">
                    <description>Unique identifier for each task</description>
                </attribute>
                <attribute name="title" type="String" required="true">
                    <description>Task title or name</description>
                </attribute>
                <attribute name="description" type="Text" required="false">
                    <description>Detailed task description and requirements</description>
                </attribute>
                <attribute name="assignee_id" type="UUID" required="false">
                    <description>ID of the user assigned to the task</description>
                </attribute>
                <attribute name="due_date" type="DateTime" required="false">
                    <description>Task due date and time</description>
                </attribute>
                <attribute name="status" type="Enum" required="true">
                    <description>Current task status (Todo, In Progress, Ready for Review, Done)</description>
                </attribute>
                <attribute name="priority" type="Enum" required="true">
                    <description>Task priority level (Low, Medium, High, Critical)</description>
                </attribute>
                <attribute name="created_at" type="DateTime" required="true">
                    <description>Timestamp when task was created</description>
                </attribute>
                <attribute name="updated_at" type="DateTime" required="true">
                    <description>Timestamp of last task update</description>
                </attribute>
            </attributes>
            <relationships>Many-to-one with Project, Many-to-one with User (assignee), One-to-many with Comments, One-to-many with Attachments</relationships>
            <businessRules>Task status transitions must follow predefined workflow, due dates cannot be in the past for new tasks, assignee must be project member</businessRules>
        </dataEntity>
        <dataEntity id="DATA-002" name="User">
            <description>User accounts and authentication information</description>
            <attributes>
                <attribute name="user_id" type="UUID" required="true">
                    <description>Unique identifier for each user</description>
                </attribute>
                <attribute name="email" type="String" required="true">
                    <description>User email address (unique)</description>
                </attribute>
                <attribute name="name" type="String" required="true">
                    <display name>Full name of the user</display name>
                </attribute>
                <attribute name="role" type="Enum" required="true">
                    <description>User role (Admin, Project Manager, Team Member)</description>
                </attribute>
                <attribute name="auth_provider" type="String" required="true">
                    <description>Authentication provider (Google, Microsoft, Local)</description>
                </attribute>
                <attribute name="last_login" type="DateTime" required="false">
                    <description>Timestamp of last user login</description>
                </attribute>
            </attributes>
            <relationships>One-to-many with Tasks (assigned), One-to-many with Tasks (created), Many-to-many with Projects</relationships>
            <businessRules>Email must be unique across all users, SSO users cannot have local passwords, role-based access control enforced</businessRules>
        </dataEntity>
        <dataEntity id="DATA-003" name="Project">
            <description>Project containers for tasks and team collaboration</description>
            <attributes>
                <attribute name="project_id" type="UUID" required="true">
                    <description>Unique identifier for each project</description>
                </attribute>
                <attribute name="name" type="String" required="true">
                    <description>Project name</description>
                </attribute>
                <attribute name="description" type="Text" required="false">
                    <description>Project description and objectives</description>
                </attribute>
                <attribute name="status" type="Enum" required="true">
                    <description>Project status (Planning, Active, On Hold, Completed, Archived)</description>
                </attribute>
                <attribute name="start_date" type="Date" required="false">
                    <description>Project start date</description>
                </attribute>
                <attribute name="end_date" type="Date" required="false">
                    <description>Project end date or target completion</description>
                </attribute>
                <attribute name="created_by" type="UUID" required="true">
                    <description>ID of user who created the project</description>
                </attribute>
            </attributes>
            <relationships>One-to-many with Tasks, Many-to-many with Users, One-to-many with Comments</relationships>
            <businessRules>Project names must be unique within organization, archived projects cannot be modified, only admins can delete projects</businessRules>
        </dataEntity>
    </dataRequirements>

    <integrationRequirements>
        <integration id="INT-001" name="SSO Authentication Integration" priority="High">
            <description>Integration with corporate identity providers for single sign-on authentication</description>
            <system>Google Workspace, Microsoft 365, other OAuth 2.0 providers</system>
            <purpose>Enable secure, seamless authentication without separate passwords</purpose>
            <dataExchange>User profile information (email, name), authentication tokens, session data</dataExchange>
            <frequency>Real-time during login, token refresh as needed</frequency>
            <security>OAuth 2.0 with PKCE, TLS 1.3, token encryption, audit logging</security>
        </integration>
        <integration id="INT-002" name="REST API for External Systems" priority="Medium">
            <description>API endpoints for external BI tools and custom integrations</description>
            <system>Power BI, Tableau, custom dashboards, third-party applications</system>
            <purpose>Enable data export, reporting, and system integration</purpose>
            <dataExchange>Project data, task information, metrics, user data in JSON format</dataExchange>
            <frequency>On-demand API calls, scheduled data syncs</frequency>
            <security>OAuth 2.0 with scopes, API rate limiting, IP whitelisting, encryption</security>
        </integration>
        <integration id="INT-003" name="AI Model Integration" priority="High">
            <description>Integration with AI services for task parsing and insights generation</description>
            <system>Cloud AI services (OpenAI, Google AI, or internal ML models)</system>
            <purpose>Natural language processing, task recommendations, project health analysis</purpose>
            <dataExchange>Task descriptions, project data, user behavior patterns, AI responses</dataExchange>
            <frequency>Real-time for task creation, batch processing for insights</frequency>
            <security>API key authentication, data anonymization, GDPR compliance</security>
        </integration>
        <integration id="INT-004" name="Email Notification Service" priority="Medium">
            <description>Integration with email services for user notifications</description>
            <system>SMTP servers, SendGrid, Amazon SES</system>
            <purpose>Send task assignments, updates, and reminders to users</purpose>
            <dataExchange>User email addresses, notification content, templates</dataExchange>
            <frequency>Real-time for critical updates, daily for summaries</frequency>
            <security>SMTP authentication, TLS encryption, unsubscribe management</security>
        </integration>
    </integrationRequirements>

    <complianceRequirements>
        <requirement id="COMP-001" name="GDPR Data Protection" priority="High">
            <description>Compliance with EU General Data Protection Regulation for user data handling</description>
            <regulation>GDPR (EU) 2016/679</regulation>
            <impact>Requires user consent management, data portability, right to deletion, privacy policies</impact>
            <implementation>Implement consent management, data anonymization, user data export/deletion APIs</implementation>
        </requirement>
        <requirement id="COMP-002" name="SOC 2 Type II Compliance" priority="High">
            <description>Security and availability controls for enterprise customer requirements</description>
            <regulation>AICPA SOC 2 Type II</regulation>
            <impact>Requires security monitoring, access controls, incident response, audit trails</impact>
            <implementation>Implement logging, monitoring, encryption, backup systems, security testing</implementation>
        </requirement>
        <requirement id="COMP-003" name="OAuth 2.0 Security Standards" priority="High">
            <description>Compliance with OAuth 2.0 security best practices for authentication</description>
            <regulation>RFC 6749 OAuth 2.0 Framework</regulation>
            <impact>Requires secure token handling, CSRF protection, state parameters, PKCE</impact>
            <implementation>Implement OAuth 2.0 with PKCE, secure token storage, regular security audits</implementation>
        </requirement>
        <requirement id="COMP-004" name="Data Retention Compliance" priority="Medium">
            <description>Compliance with data retention regulations and corporate policies</description>
            <regulation>Industry-specific regulations, corporate governance policies</regulation>
            <impact>Requires automated archival, deletion policies, legal hold capabilities</impact>
            <implementation>Implement retention schedules, automated archival, compliance monitoring</implementation>
        </requirement>
    </complianceRequirements>

    <successCriteria>
        <criterion id="SC-001" name="Task Creation Efficiency" priority="High">
            <description>Reduce average task creation time by 50% through AI assistance</description>
            <measurement>Time tracking from task initiation to save completion</measurement>
            <target>50% reduction compared to manual baseline</target>
            <timeframe>6 months after launch</timeframe>
        </criterion>
        <criterion id="SC-002" name="User Adoption Rate" priority="High">
            <description>Achieve 80% active user adoption within target organizations</description>
            <measurement>Daily active users / total registered users ratio</measurement>
            <target>80% of registered users active daily</target>
            <timeframe>3 months after deployment</timeframe>
        </criterion>
        <criterion id="SC-003" name="Real-time Collaboration Performance" priority="High">
            <description>Ensure sub-2-second synchronization for all real-time updates</description>
            <measurement>Latency measurement from action to remote display</measurement>
            <target>95% of updates synchronized within 2 seconds</target>
            <timeframe>Continuous monitoring</timeframe>
        </criterion>
        <criterion id="SC-004" name="API Integration Success" priority="Medium">
            <description>Enable successful integration with 90% of requested external systems</description>
            <measurement>Number of successful integrations / total integration requests</measurement>
            <target>90% integration success rate</target>
            <timeframe>12 months after launch</timeframe>
        </criterion>
        <criterion id="SC-005" name="Security Compliance" priority="High">
            <description>Maintain 100% compliance with security regulations and standards</description>
            <measurement>Security audit results, compliance assessments</measurement>
            <target>Zero critical security violations, 100% compliance</target>
            <timeframe>Ongoing with quarterly reviews</timeframe>
        </criterion>
    </successCriteria>
</businessRequirementsDocument>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
    <title>BRD for Comprehensive Test Project 20251105_113858</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Business Requirements Document for AI-powered project management platform">
    <meta name="author" content="AICOE - AI Center of Excellence">
    <link rel="icon" type="image/x-icon" href="/favicon.ico">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@300;400;500;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest/dist/umd/lucide.js"></script>
    <style>
        /* AICOE Design System CSS */
        *, *::before, *::after {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        :root {
            /* Primary Monochrome Colors */
            --black: #000000;
            --white: #FFFFFF;

            /* Gray Scale (9-step system) */
            --gray-100: #F5F5F5;
            --gray-200: #E5E5E5;
            --gray-300: #D4D4D4;
            --gray-400: #A3A3A3;
            --gray-500: #737373;
            --gray-600: #525252;
            --gray-700: #404040;
            --gray-800: #262626;
            --gray-900: #171717;

            /* Accent Colors */
            --accent-red: #FF0000;
            --accent-red-light: #FFE5E5;
            --accent-red-dark: #CC0000;
            --accent-blue: #0066FF;
            --accent-blue-light: #E5F0FF;
            --accent-blue-dark: #0052CC;
            --accent-green: #00CC66;
            --accent-green-light: #E5F9F0;
            --accent-green-dark: #00A352;
            --accent-orange: #FF8800;
            --accent-orange-light: #FFF4E5;
            --accent-orange-dark: #CC6D00;
            --accent-purple: #8800FF;
            --accent-purple-light: #F2E5FF;
            --accent-purple-dark: #6D00CC;
            --accent-yellow: #FFD700;
            --accent-yellow-light: #FFFAEB;
            --accent-yellow-dark: #CCAC00;

            /* Semantic Colors */
            --success: #00CC66;
            --success-bg: #E5F9F0;
            --success-border: #00A352;
            --error: #FF0000;
            --error-bg: #FFE5E5;
            --error-border: #CC0000;
            --warning: #FF8800;
            --warning-bg: #FFF4E5;
            --warning-border: #CC6D00;
            --info: #0066FF;
            --info-bg: #E5F0FF;
            --info-border: #0052CC;

            /* Text Colors */
            --text-primary: #000000;
            --text-secondary: #525252;
            --text-tertiary: #737373;
            --text-inverse: #FFFFFF;

            /* Background Colors */
            --bg-primary: #FFFFFF;
            --bg-secondary: #F5F5F5;
            --bg-tertiary: #E5E5E5;
            --bg-dark: #000000;
            --bg-gray: #171717;

            /* Border Colors */
            --border-light: #E5E5E5;
            --border-medium: #D4D4D4;
            --border-dark: #000000;
            --border-focus: #0066FF;

            /* Typography */
            --font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', 'Inter', sans-serif;
            --font-h1: 5rem;
            --font-h2: 3rem;
            --font-h3: 1.5rem;
            --font-h4: 1.25rem;
            --font-body: 1rem;
            --font-small: 0.95rem;
            --font-caption: 0.875rem;
            --font-label: 0.875rem;

            /* Font Weights */
            --font-weight-light: 300;
            --font-weight-normal: 400;
            --font-weight-medium: 500;
            --font-weight-semibold: 600;
            --font-weight-bold: 700;

            /* Line Heights */
            --line-height-tight: 1.1;
            --line-height-normal: 1.5;
            --line-height-relaxed: 1.6;
            --line-height-loose: 1.7;

            /* Letter Spacing */
            --letter-spacing-tight: -0.03em;
            --letter-spacing-normal: 0;
            --letter-spacing-wide: 0.05em;
            --letter-spacing-wider: 0.1em;

            /* Spacing System */
            --space-xs: 0.5rem;
            --space-sm: 1rem;
            --space-md: 1.5rem;
            --space-lg: 2.5rem;
            --space-xl: 3rem;
            --space-2xl: 4rem;
            --space-3xl: 6rem;

            /* Sizing */
            --max-width: 1280px;
            --header-height: 80px;
            --icon-size: 48px;

            /* Border Radius */
            --radius-none: 0;
            --radius-sm: 2px;
            --radius-md: 4px;
            --radius-lg: 8px;
            --radius-full: 9999px;

            /* Shadows */
            --shadow-none: none;
            --shadow-sm: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
            --shadow-md: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
            --shadow-lg: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
            --shadow-hover: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);

            /* Transitions */
            --transition-fast: 150ms ease;
            --transition-normal: 200ms ease;
            --transition-slow: 300ms ease;
            --transition-colors: color 200ms ease, background-color 200ms ease, border-color 200ms ease;
            --transition-transform: transform 200ms ease;
            --transition-all: all 200ms ease;
        }

        html {
            font-size: 16px;
            -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
            -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }

        body {
            font-family: var(--font-family);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            background-color: var(--bg-primary);
            min-height: 100vh;
            line-height: var(--line-height-relaxed);
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
        }

        h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
            line-height: var(--line-height-tight);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-md);
            color: var(--text-primary);
        }

        h1 {
            font-size: var(--font-h1);
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-light);
            letter-spacing: var(--letter-spacing-tight);
        }

        h2 {
            font-size: var(--font-h2);
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
        }

        h3 {
            font-size: var(--font-h3);
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
        }

        h4 {
            font-size: var(--font-h4);
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
        }

        p {
            margin-bottom: var(--space-md);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            line-height: var(--line-height-loose);
        }

        .text-secondary {
            color: var(--text-secondary);
        }

        .text-tertiary {
            color: var(--text-tertiary);
        }

        .text-small {
            font-size: var(--font-small);
        }

        .text-caption {
            font-size: var(--font-caption);
        }

        .text-uppercase {
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: var(--letter-spacing-wider);
            font-size: var(--font-label);
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold);
        }

        a {
            color: var(--text-primary);
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: var(--transition-colors);
        }

        a:hover {
            color: var(--text-secondary);
        }

        .container {
            max-width: var(--max-width);
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 0 var(--space-xl);
        }

        .section {
            padding: var(--space-3xl) 0;
        }

        .section-lg {
            padding: calc(var(--space-3xl) * 1.5) 0;
        }

        .grid {
            display: grid;
            gap: var(--space-xl);
        }

        .grid-cols-1 { grid-template-columns: repeat(1, 1fr); }
        .grid-cols-2 { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); }
        .grid-cols-3 { grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr); }
        .grid-cols-4 { grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr); }

        .flex {
            display: flex;
            gap: var(--space-md);
            align-items: center;
        }

        .flex-between {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
            gap: var(--space-md);
        }

        .flex-col {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: var(--space-md);
        }

        .text-center { text-align: center; }
        .text-left { text-align: left; }
        .text-right { text-align: right; }

        .mt-sm { margin-top: var(--space-sm); }
        .mt-md { margin-top: var(--space-md); }
        .mt-lg { margin-top: var(--space-lg); }
        .mt-xl { margin-top: var(--space-xl); }

        .mb-sm { margin-bottom: var(--space-sm); }
        .mb-md { margin-bottom: var(--space-md); }
        .mb-lg { margin-bottom: var(--space-lg); }
        .mb-xl { margin-bottom: var(--space-xl); }

        .card {
            background: var(--bg-primary);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
            padding: var(--space-lg);
            transition: var(--transition-all);
        }

        .card:hover {
            border-color: var(--border-dark);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-hover);
        }

        .card-minimal {
            background: var(--bg-primary);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
            padding: var(--space-lg);
        }

        .card-icon {
            width: var(--icon-size);
            height: var(--icon-size);
            background: var(--black);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-md);
        }

        .card-title {
            font-size: var(--font-h3);
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-sm);
        }

        .card-description {
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            line-height: var(--line-height-loose);
        }

        .metric-card {
            background: var(--bg-primary);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
            padding: var(--space-lg);
            text-align: center;
            transition: var(--transition-all);
        }

        .metric-card:hover {
            border-color: var(--border-dark);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }

        .metric-value {
            font-size: 3rem;
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-light);
            line-height: var(--line-height-tight);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-xs);
            color: var(--text-primary);
        }

        .metric-value.accent-red { color: var(--accent-red); }
        .metric-value.accent-blue { color: var(--accent-blue); }
        .metric-value.accent-green { color: var(--accent-green); }
        .metric-value.accent-orange { color: var(--accent-orange); }
        .metric-value.accent-purple { color: var(--accent-purple); }

        .metric-label {
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            font-size: var(--font-caption);
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: var(--letter-spacing-wider);
        }

        .btn {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: var(--space-xs);
            padding: var(--space-sm) var(--space-lg);
            font-size: var(--font-body);
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
            font-family: var(--font-family);
            line-height: 1;
            border: 1px solid transparent;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: var(--transition-all);
            text-decoration: none;
            white-space: nowrap;
            user-select: none;
            border-radius: var(--radius-none);
        }

        .btn:focus {
            outline: 2px solid var(--border-focus);
            outline-offset: 2px;
        }

        .btn:disabled {
            opacity: 0.5;
            cursor: not-allowed;
        }

        .btn:not(:disabled):hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }

        .btn-primary {
            background-color: var(--black);
            color: var(--white);
            border-color: var(--black);
        }

        .btn-primary:hover:not(:disabled) {
            background-color: var(--gray-900);
            border-color: var(--gray-900);
        }

        .btn-secondary {
            background-color: var(--white);
            color: var(--black);
            border-color: var(--border-light);
        }

        .btn-secondary:hover:not(:disabled) {
            border-color: var(--border-dark);
        }

        .btn-accent {
            background-color: var(--accent-blue);
            color: var(--white);
            border-color: var(--accent-blue);
        }

        .btn-accent:hover:not(:disabled) {
            background-color: var(--accent-blue-dark);
            border-color: var(--accent-blue-dark);
        }

        .btn-lg {
            padding: var(--space-md) calc(var(--space-lg) * 1.5);
            font-size: var(--font-body);
        }

        .btn-sm {
            padding: var(--space-xs) var(--space-md);
            font-size: var(--font-small);
        }

        .navbar {
            background-color: var(--bg-primary);
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-light);
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            z-index: 1000;
            height: var(--header-height);
        }

        .nav-container {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
            height: 100%;
            padding: 0 var(--space-xl);
            max-width: var(--max-width);
            margin: 0 auto;
        }

        .nav-brand {
            font-size: var(--font-h4);
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            text-decoration: none;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: var(--space-xs);
        }

        .nav-brand:hover {
            color: var(--text-secondary);
        }

        .nav-menu {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: var(--space-lg);
            list-style: none;
        }

        .nav-link {
            color: var(--text-primary);
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
            transition: var(--transition-colors);
            text-decoration: none;
            padding: var(--space-xs) 0;
            position: relative;
        }

        .nav-link:hover {
            color: var(--text-secondary);
        }

        .nav-link.active {
            color: var(--text-primary);
        }

        .nav-link.active::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            bottom: -2px;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            height: 2px;
            background-color: var(--black);
        }

        .status {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: var(--space-xs);
            padding: var(--space-xs) var(--space-md);
            border: 1px solid;
            font-size: var(--font-caption);
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
            line-height: 1;
            white-space: nowrap;
        }

        .status-success {
            background-color: var(--success-bg);
            color: var(--success);
            border-color: var(--success-border);
        }

        .status-error {
            background-color: var(--error-bg);
            color: var(--error);
            border-color: var(--error-border);
        }

        .status-warning {
            background-color: var(--warning-bg);
            color: var(--warning);
            border-color: var(--warning-border);
        }

        .status-info {
            background-color: var(--info-bg);
            color: var(--info);
            border-color: var(--info-border);
        }

        .status-dot {
            width: 6px;
            height: 6px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background-color: currentColor;
        }

        .table-container {
            background-color: var(--bg-primary);
            overflow: hidden;
            border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
        }

        .table {
            width: 100%;
            border-collapse: collapse;
            font-size: var(--font-body);
        }

        .table th,
        .table td {
            padding: var(--space-md);
            text-align: left;
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-light);
        }

        .table th {
            background-color: var(--bg-secondary);
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            font-size: var(--font-small);
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: var(--letter-spacing-wider);
        }

        .table tbody tr {
            transition: var(--transition-colors);
        }

        .table tbody tr:hover {
            background-color: var(--bg-secondary);
        }

        .table tbody tr:last-child td {
            border-bottom: none;
        }

        .form-group {
            margin-bottom: var(--space-md);
        }

        .form-label {
            display: block;
            font-size: var(--font-small);
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-xs);
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: var(--letter-spacing-wide);
        }

        .form-input,
        .form-select,
        .form-textarea {
            width: 100%;
            padding: var(--space-sm) var(--space-md);
            font-family: var(--font-family);
            font-size: var(--font-body);
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            background-color: var(--bg-primary);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
            transition: var(--transition-colors);
        }

        .form-input:hover,
        .form-select:hover,
        .form-textarea:hover {
            border-color: var(--border-medium);
        }

        .form-input:focus,
        .form-select:focus,
        .form-textarea:focus {
            outline: none;
            border-color: var(--border-dark);
        }

        .form-textarea {
            resize: vertical;
            min-height: 120px;
        }

        .alert {
            padding: var(--space-md);
            border: 1px solid;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-md);
        }

        .alert-success {
            background-color: var(--success-bg);
            border-color: var(--success-border);
            color: var(--success);
        }

        .alert-error {
            background-color: var(--error-bg);
            border-color: var(--error-border);
            color: var(--error);
        }

        .alert-warning {
            background-color: var(--warning-bg);
            border-color: var(--warning-border);
            color: var(--warning);
        }

        .alert-info {
            background-color: var(--info-bg);
            border-color: var(--info-border);
            color: var(--info);
        }

        @keyframes pulse {
            0%, 100% {
                opacity: 1;
            }
            50% {
                opacity: 0.5;
            }
        }

        .pulse {
            animation: pulse 2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.6, 1) infinite;
        }

        .pulse-indicator {
            width: 8px;
            height: 8px;
            background-color: var(--accent-red);
            border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
        }

        .divider {
            height: 1px;
            background-color: var(--border-light);
            margin: var(--space-xl) 0;
        }

        .hero {
            padding: calc(var(--header-height) + var(--space-3xl)) 0 var(--space-3xl) 0;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .hero h1 {
            margin-bottom: var(--space-lg);
        }

        .footer {
            background-color: var(--bg-secondary);
            border-top: 1px solid var(--border-light);
            padding: var(--space-3xl) 0;
            margin-top: var(--space-3xl);
        }

        .sr-only {
            position: absolute;
            width: 1px;
            height: 1px;
            padding: 0;
            margin: -1px;
            overflow: hidden;
            clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
            white-space: nowrap;
            border-width: 0;
        }

        *:focus-visible {
            outline: 2px solid var(--border-focus);
            outline-offset: 2px;
        }

        .aicoe-logo {
            display: inline-block;
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        .aicoe-logo img {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            display: block;
            object-fit: contain;
        }

        /* Custom styles for BRD */
        body {
            padding-top: var(--header-height);
        }

        .toc {
            background: var(--bg-secondary);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
            padding: var(--space-lg);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-xl);
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
        }

        .toc h3 {
            margin-top: 0;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-md);
            font-size: var(--font-h3);
        }

        .toc ul {
            list-style: none;
            padding: 0;
            margin: 0;
        }

        .toc li {
            margin-bottom: var(--space-xs);
        }

        .toc a {
            color: var(--text-primary);
            text-decoration: none;
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
            display: block;
            padding: var(--space-xs) var(--space-sm);
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            transition: var(--transition-colors);
        }

        .toc a:hover {
            background: var(--bg-primary);
            color: var(--accent-blue);
        }

        .toc .toc-level-2 {
            margin-left: var(--space-md);
        }

        .toc .toc-level-2 a {
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-normal);
            font-size: var(--font-small);
        }

        .section-header {
            border-bottom: 2px solid var(--border-light);
            padding-bottom: var(--space-sm);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-xl);
        }

        .kpi-card {
            background: var(--bg-primary);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
            padding: var(--space-lg);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-md);
            border-left: 4px solid var(--accent-blue);
        }

        .kpi-target {
            font-size: var(--font-h4);
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold);
            color: var(--accent-blue);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-xs);
        }

        .stakeholder-card {
            background: var(--bg-primary);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
            padding: var(--space-lg);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-md);
            position: relative;
        }

        .stakeholder-card::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            top: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            width: 4px;
            background: var(--accent-purple);
        }

        .stakeholder-card.high-influence::before {
            background: var(--accent-red);
        }

        .stakeholder-card.medium-influence::before {
            background: var(--accent-orange);
        }

        .rule-card {
            background: var(--bg-primary);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
            padding: var(--space-lg);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-md);
            border-left: 4px solid var(--accent-green);
        }

        .rule-card.high-priority {
            border-left-color: var(--accent-red);
        }

        .rule-card.medium-priority {
            border-left-color: var(--accent-orange);
        }

        .process-step {
            display: flex;
            align-items: flex-start;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-md);
            padding: var(--space-md);
            background: var(--bg-secondary);
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
        }

        .step-number {
            width: 32px;
            height: 32px;
            background: var(--black);
            color: var(--white);
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold);
            margin-right: var(--space-md);
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        .data-entity-card {
            background: var(--bg-primary);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
            padding: var(--space-lg);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-md);
            border-left: 4px solid var(--accent-blue);
        }

        .attribute-list {
            list-style: none;
            padding: 0;
            margin: var(--space-md) 0;
        }

        .attribute-list li {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            padding: var(--space-xs) 0;
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-light);
        }

        .attribute-list li:last-child {
            border-bottom: none;
        }

        .integration-card {
            background: var(--bg-primary);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
            padding: var(--space-lg);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-md);
            border-left: 4px solid var(--accent-purple);
        }

        .compliance-card {
            background: var(--bg-primary);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
            padding: var(--space-lg);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-md);
            border-left: 4px solid var(--accent-green);
        }

        .compliance-card.high-priority {
            border-left-color: var(--accent-red);
        }

        .success-criteria-card {
            background: var(--bg-primary);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-light);
            padding: var(--space-lg);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-md);
            border-left: 4px solid var(--accent-green);
        }

        .success-criteria-card.high-priority {
            border-left-color: var(--accent-red);
        }

        @media (max-width: 1024px) {
            :root {
                --font-h1: 3rem;
                --font-h2: 2rem;
            }

            .grid-cols-3,
            .grid-cols-4 {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            :root {
                --font-h1: 2.5rem;
                --font-h2: 1.75rem;
                --font-h3: 1.25rem;
            }

            .container {
                padding: 0 var(--space-md);
            }

            .nav-container {
                padding: 0 var(--space-md);
            }

            .section {
                padding: var(--space-xl) 0;
            }

            .grid-cols-2,
            .grid-cols-3,
            .grid-cols-4 {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }

            .flex-between {
                flex-direction: column;
                align-items: stretch;
            }

            .nav-menu {
                gap: var(--space-md);
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 480px) {
            :root {
                --font-h1: 2rem;
                --space-xl: 2rem;
                --space-3xl: 3rem;
            }
        }

        @media print {
            .navbar, .footer {
                display: none;
            }
            
            body {
                padding-top: 0;
            }
            
            .section {
                padding: var(--space-lg) 0;
            }
            
            .card {
                break-inside: avoid;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
