<functionalRequirementsDocument>
    <title>FRD for Comprehensive Test Project 20251105_113858</title>
    <functionalOverview>A comprehensive AI-powered project management system that enables intelligent task creation, real-time collaboration, workload optimization, and data-driven project insights. The system leverages artificial intelligence to enhance productivity through automated task parsing, intelligent assignee suggestions, workload prioritization, and project health monitoring. Key features include natural language task creation, real-time collaboration tools, SSO authentication, API integration capabilities, and AI-generated insights for both individual users and project managers.</functionalOverview>

    <userStories>
        <userStory id="US-001" name="AI-Assisted Task Creation" priority="High">
            <asA>As a team member</asA>
            <iWant>I want to create tasks using natural language with AI assistance</iWant>
            <soThat>I can quickly create tasks without manually filling all fields</soThat>
            <acceptanceCriteria>
                <criteria>Given I am logged into a project When I enter a task in natural language Then the system parses and pre-fills title, due date, and suggests assignees</criteria>
                <criteria>Given AI suggestions are provided When I review them Then I can accept, modify, or reject any suggestion</criteria>
                <criteria>Given I have created a task When I save it Then it appears in real-time for all team members</criteria>
                <criteria>Given a task is assigned When it is created Then the assigned user receives a notification</criteria>
            </acceptanceCriteria>
            <businessValue>Reduces task creation time by 60% and improves data consistency through AI-powered parsing and suggestions</businessValue>
            <estimation>8 story points</estimation>
        </userStory>
        <userStory id="US-002" name="Personalized AI Dashboard" priority="High">
            <asA>As a team member</asA>
            <iWant>I want to see AI-powered task prioritization on my dashboard</iWant>
            <soThat>I can focus on the most important tasks first</soThat>
            <acceptanceCriteria>
                <criteria>Given I log into the application When I view my dashboard Then I see 3-5 prioritized tasks with rationale</criteria>
                <criteria>Given I have tasks assigned When I view my workload Then I see a visual capacity indicator</criteria>
                <criteria>Given I click on a suggested task When I select it Then I navigate directly to task details</criteria>
                <criteria>Given I have no tasks assigned When I view my dashboard Then I see a clear schedule message</criteria>
            </acceptanceCriteria>
            <businessValue>Increases individual productivity by 25% through intelligent task prioritization and workload management</businessValue>
            <estimation>5 story points</estimation>
        </userStory>
        <userStory id="US-003" name="Real-Time Task Collaboration" priority="High">
            <asA>As a team member</asA>
            <iWant>I want to collaborate on tasks in real-time with other team members</iWant>
            <soThat>We can work together seamlessly without communication delays</soThat>
            <acceptanceCriteria>
                <criteria>Given multiple users have the same task open When one user adds a comment Then it appears instantly for all users</criteria>
                <criteria>Given a user attaches a file When they upload it Then it's immediately visible to all collaborators</criteria>
                <criteria>Given a user changes task status When they update it Then the change reflects in real-time for everyone</criteria>
                <criteria>Given I lose connectivity When I make changes Then they are queued and synced when connection restores</criteria>
            </acceptanceCriteria>
            <businessValue>Eliminates communication delays and accelerates decision-making by 40%</businessValue>
            <estimation>13 story points</estimation>
        </userStory>
        <userStory id="US-004" name="SSO Authentication" priority="High">
            <asA>As a user</asA>
            <iWant>I want to log in using my corporate credentials</iWant>
            <soThat>I don't need to remember another password</soThat>
            <acceptanceCriteria>
                <criteria>Given I am on the login page When I click 'Login with Google' Then I'm redirected to Google authentication</criteria>
                <criteria>Given I successfully authenticate with Google When I return Then I'm logged into the application</criteria>
                <criteria>Given I'm a new user When I first authenticate Then my account is automatically provisioned</criteria>
                <criteria>Given I deny access on Google When I return Then I see an error message and remain logged out</criteria>
            </acceptanceCriteria>
            <businessValue>Enhances security and reduces login friction, improving adoption rates by 30%</businessValue>
            <estimation>8 story points</estimation>
        </userStory>
        <userStory id="US-005" name="API Project Reporting" priority="Medium">
            <asA>As a project manager</asA>
            <iWant>I want to generate project reports via REST API</iWant>
            <soThat>I can integrate with BI tools and automate reporting</soThat>
            <acceptanceCriteria>
                <criteria>Given I have a valid API token When I call the reports endpoint Then I receive structured JSON data</criteria>
                <criteria>Given I specify query parameters When I make the request Then the data is filtered accordingly</criteria>
                <criteria>Given I have proper permissions When I access project data Then the API returns the report successfully</criteria>
                <criteria>Given I lack permissions When I access project data Then I receive a 403 Forbidden error</criteria>
            </acceptanceCriteria>
            <businessValue>Enables seamless integration with enterprise systems and automates reporting processes</businessValue>
            <estimation>5 story points</estimation>
        </userStory>
        <userStory id="US-006" name="AI Project Health Summary" priority="Medium">
            <asA>As a project manager</asA>
            <iWant>I want to receive AI-generated project health summaries</iWant>
            <soThat>I can quickly understand project status and take proactive actions</soThat>
            <acceptanceCriteria>
                <criteria>Given I view the project dashboard When sufficient data exists Then I see an AI-generated health summary</criteria>
                <criteria>Given risks are identified When I view the summary Then I see specific recommendations for mitigation</criteria>
                <criteria>Given I click on a risk When I select it Then I see underlying data and can take action</criteria>
                <criteria>Given the project is new When I view the dashboard Then I see a message about insufficient data</criteria>
            </acceptanceCriteria>
            <businessValue>Enables proactive project management and improves project success rates by 20%</businessValue>
            <estimation>8 story points</estimation>
        </userStory>
    </userStories>

    <functionalSpecifications>
        <specification id="FS-001" name="Natural Language Task Parser" priority="High">
            <description>AI-powered system that parses natural language task descriptions to extract title, due dates, priorities, and contextual information</description>
            <inputs>Natural language text input from user, project context, team member profiles and roles</inputs>
            <processing>Uses NLP models to identify temporal expressions, action items, assignees, and priority indicators. Cross-references with project data for context awareness</processing>
            <outputs>Structured task data with parsed title, suggested due date, priority level, and recommended assignees</outputs>
            <preconditions>User is authenticated and has project access, AI model is loaded and available</preconditions>
            <postconditions>Task fields are pre-populated with parsed data, suggestions are displayed to user</postconditions>
            <exceptions>Unable to parse input - falls back to manual entry, ambiguous dates - requests clarification</exceptions>
        </specification>
        <specification id="FS-002" name="Real-Time Collaboration Engine" priority="High">
            <description>WebSocket-based system enabling real-time synchronization of task updates across multiple users</description>
            <inputs>User actions (comments, status changes, file uploads), task ID, user session information</inputs>
            <processing>Broadcasts changes to all connected users viewing the same task, maintains conflict resolution for concurrent edits</processing>
            <outputs>Real-time updates pushed to all clients, synchronized task state across all sessions</outputs>
            <preconditions>Multiple users have the same task open, WebSocket connection is established</preconditions>
            <postconditions>All users see consistent, up-to-date task state, change history is recorded</postconditions>
            <exceptions>Connection lost - queues changes locally, conflicts detected - prompts for resolution</exceptions>
        </specification>
        <specification id="FS-003" name="OAuth 2.0 Authentication Flow" priority="High">
            <description>Secure authentication system using OAuth 2.0 for SSO integration with external identity providers</description>
            <inputs>Authorization code from identity provider, client credentials, user consent</inputs>
            <processing>Exchanges authorization code for access token, retrieves user profile, creates or updates user account, establishes session</processing>
            <outputs>Authenticated user session, user profile data, access/refresh tokens</outputs>
            <preconditions>OAuth client is configured with identity provider, redirect URLs are properly set</preconditions>
            <postconditions>User is authenticated and redirected to application dashboard with valid session</postconditions>
            <exceptions>Invalid authorization code - returns error, user denies consent - authentication fails</exceptions>
        </specification>
        <specification id="FS-004" name="AI Workload Analysis Engine" priority="High">
            <description>Machine learning system that analyzes user workload and provides intelligent task prioritization</description>
            <inputs>User's assigned tasks, deadlines, task dependencies, historical completion data, team capacity</inputs>
            <processing>Calculates task urgency scores, identifies bottlenecks, optimizes task ordering based on multiple factors</processing>
            <outputs>Prioritized task list with rationale, workload capacity indicators, productivity insights</outputs>
            <preconditions>User has assigned tasks, sufficient historical data exists for analysis</preconditions>
            <postconditions>Dashboard displays prioritized tasks and workload metrics, recommendations are generated</postconditions>
            <exceptions>Insufficient data - displays learning message, conflicting priorities - flags for manual review</exceptions>
        </specification>
        <specification id="FS-005" name="Project Health Analytics" priority="Medium">
            <description>AI system that analyzes project metrics and generates natural language health summaries</description>
            <inputs>Project task data, completion rates, timeline data, resource allocation, team performance metrics</inputs>
            <processing>Identifies trends, calculates health scores, detects risks, generates narrative summaries with recommendations</processing>
            <outputs>Natural language project summary, risk indicators, actionable recommendations, visual health metrics</outputs>
            <preconditions>Project has been active for minimum period, sufficient task data is available</preconditions>
            <postconditions>Project dashboard displays health summary and insights, risks are highlighted with mitigation strategies</postconditions>
            <exceptions>Insufficient data - displays learning message, conflicting metrics - requests manual review</exceptions>
        </specification>
        <specification id="FS-006" name="REST API Reporting System" priority="Medium">
            <description>Secure RESTful API for programmatic access to project reports and analytics data</description>
            <inputs>API authentication token, project ID, query parameters (date range, grouping, filters)</inputs>
            <processing>Validates authentication and permissions, queries database, aggregates data, formats JSON response</processing>
            <outputs>Structured JSON report with project metrics, task statistics, performance indicators</outputs>
            <preconditions>Valid API token, user has report:read permissions for requested project</preconditions>
            <postconditions>API returns 200 OK with report data, request is logged for audit purposes</postconditions>
            <exceptions>Invalid token - 401 Unauthorized, insufficient permissions - 403 Forbidden, invalid project - 404 Not Found</exceptions>
        </specification>
    </functionalSpecifications>

    <systemBehavior>
        <behavior id="SB-001" name="Task Creation with AI Assistance" priority="High">
            <description>System behavior when creating new tasks with natural language input and AI suggestions</description>
            <trigger>User clicks 'Add Task' button and enters natural language description</trigger>
            <sequence>1. System captures natural language input 2. AI model parses text in real-time 3. System extracts title, due date, priority 4. System queries team member data for assignee suggestions 5. System pre-fills form fields 6. System displays suggestions to user 7. User reviews and modifies 8. System validates data 9. System creates task record 10. System broadcasts update to all users 11. System sends notifications</sequence>
            <conditions>User must have project write permissions, AI model must be available, team member data must be accessible</conditions>
            <outcomes>Task created successfully with AI-assisted data, all users see updated task list, assignees notified</outcomes>
        </behavior>
        <behavior id="SB-002" name="Real-Time Collaboration Synchronization" priority="High">
            <description>System behavior for synchronizing real-time collaboration across multiple users</description>
            <trigger>User performs action on task (comment, status change, file upload) while others are viewing</trigger>
            <sequence>1. System captures user action 2. System validates action 3. System updates database 4. System broadcasts change via WebSocket 5. All connected clients receive update 6. Clients update UI in real-time 7. System logs change for audit trail</sequence>
            <conditions>WebSocket connections must be active, users must have task access, database must be available</conditions>
            <outcomes>All users see synchronized updates, conflict-free collaboration maintained, audit trail created</outcomes>
        </behavior>
        <behavior id="SB-003" name="OAuth 2.0 Authentication Process" priority="High">
            <description>System behavior for SSO authentication using OAuth 2.0 flow</description>
            <trigger>User clicks SSO login button (Google, Microsoft, etc.)</trigger>
            <sequence>1. System generates OAuth request 2. User redirected to identity provider 3. User authenticates with provider 4. Provider redirects with authorization code 5. System exchanges code for tokens 6. System retrieves user profile 7. System creates/updates user account 8. System establishes session 9. User redirected to dashboard</sequence>
            <conditions>OAuth client must be configured, identity provider must be available, redirect URLs must match</conditions>
            <outcomes>User authenticated with valid session, account provisioned if new, user logged into application</outcomes>
        </behavior>
        <behavior id="SB-004" name="AI Dashboard Personalization" priority="High">
            <description>System behavior for generating personalized AI insights on user dashboard</description>
            <trigger>User logs in and navigates to personal dashboard</trigger>
            <sequence>1. System identifies user 2. System retrieves user's assigned tasks 3. System analyzes task data 4. AI engine calculates priorities 5. System assesses workload capacity 6. System generates insights 7. System formats dashboard widgets 8. System displays personalized content</sequence>
            <conditions>User must be authenticated, task data must be available, AI engine must be operational</conditions>
            <outcomes>Personalized dashboard displayed with prioritized tasks and workload insights</outcomes>
        </behavior>
        <behavior id="SB-005" name="API Request Processing" priority="Medium">
            <description>System behavior for processing REST API requests for project reports</description>
            <trigger>Authenticated request made to API endpoint with valid token</trigger>
            <sequence>1. System receives HTTP request 2. System validates authentication token 3. System checks user permissions 4. System validates request parameters 5. System queries database 6. System aggregates and processes data 7. System formats JSON response 8. System returns response with appropriate status code</sequence>
            <conditions>API must be enabled, authentication service must be available, database must be accessible</conditions>
            <outcomes>Structured report data returned in JSON format, request logged for monitoring and audit</outcomes>
        </behavior>
    </systemBehavior>

    <dataProcessing>
        <process id="DP-001" name="Natural Language Task Processing">
            <description>Processing pipeline for converting natural language task descriptions into structured task data</description>
            <inputData>Raw text input from user, project context metadata, team member profiles, historical task patterns</inputData>
            <transformation>Text tokenization, entity recognition for dates and people, sentiment analysis for priority, context-aware suggestion generation using ML models</transformation>
            <outputData>Structured JSON with parsed fields: title, description, due_date, priority, suggested_assignees, confidence_scores</outputData>
            <validation>Input text length validation, date format verification, assignee availability checks, permission validation</validation>
            <errorHandling>Invalid input formats trigger manual entry prompts, low confidence scores request user confirmation, unavailable AI models fall back to basic parsing</errorHandling>
        </process>
        <process id="DP-002" name="Real-Time Data Synchronization">
            <description>Data synchronization process for maintaining consistency across real-time collaboration sessions</description>
            <inputData>User action events, task state changes, file uploads, comment additions, status updates</inputData>
            <transformation>Event serialization, conflict detection and resolution, state diff calculation, WebSocket message formatting, change log generation</transformation>
            <outputData>WebSocket messages to connected clients, updated database records, audit trail entries, notification payloads</outputData>
            <validation>Event source authentication, permission verification, data integrity checks, message format validation</validation>
            <errorHandling>Connection failures queue events locally, conflicts prompt user resolution, invalid events are logged and rejected</errorHandling>
        </process>
        <process id="DP-003" name="Workload Analytics Processing">
            <description>Analytics pipeline for processing user workload data and generating prioritization insights</description>
            <inputData>User task assignments, due dates, estimated effort, actual time spent, task dependencies, team capacity data</inputData>
            <transformation>Workload capacity calculation, urgency scoring algorithm, bottleneck identification, trend analysis, recommendation engine processing</transformation>
            <outputData>Prioritized task list with scores, workload percentage, risk indicators, productivity metrics, optimization suggestions</outputData>
            <validation>Data completeness checks, date range validation, effort estimate verification, dependency cycle detection</validation>
            <errorHandling>Missing data points use default values, calculation errors trigger fallback algorithms, insufficient data displays learning message</errorHandling>
        </process>
        <process id="DP-004" name="Project Health Analysis">
            <description>Comprehensive analysis process for generating project health summaries and insights</description>
            <inputData>Project task completion rates, timeline variance, resource utilization, team performance metrics, risk indicators</inputData>
            <transformation>Health score calculation, trend analysis, risk assessment modeling, natural language generation for summaries, visualization data preparation</transformation>
            <outputData>Health score (0-100), narrative summary, risk list with severity, recommendations, chart data for visualizations</outputData>
            <validation>Data quality checks, statistical significance validation, trend confirmation, risk threshold verification</validation>
            <errorHandling>Insufficient data displays learning message, statistical anomalies flag for review, generation failures use template summaries</errorHandling>
        </process>
        <process id="DP-005" name="API Report Aggregation">
            <description>Data aggregation process for generating project reports through REST API</description>
            <inputData>Database query results, task data, time logs, user assignments, project metadata, filter parameters</inputData>
            <transformation>SQL query execution, data filtering and grouping, metric calculations (completion rate, cycle time, velocity), JSON structure building</transformation>
            <outputData>Structured JSON report with summary statistics, detailed task lists, performance metrics, trend data</outputData>
            <validation>Parameter validation, permission checks, data range verification, query result validation</validation>
            <errorHandling>Invalid parameters return 400 Bad Request, permission denied returns 403, database errors return 500 with safe message</errorHandling>
        </process>
    </dataProcessing>

    <interfaceRequirements>
        <interface id="IF-001" name="Task Creation Interface" type="UI">
            <description>User interface for creating new tasks with AI assistance and natural language input</description>
            <purpose>Enable efficient task creation through AI-powered parsing and suggestions</purpose>
            <specifications>Modal dialog with natural language input field, real-time parsing feedback, AI suggestion panels for assignees and dates, rich text editor for descriptions, file attachment area, priority selector, save/cancel buttons</specifications>
            <interactions>User types in natural language field, system provides real-time parsing feedback, user reviews AI suggestions, user can override suggestions, user adds additional details, user saves task</interactions>
            <accessibility>WCAG 2.1 AA compliance, keyboard navigation support, screen reader compatibility, high contrast mode support, semantic HTML structure</accessibility>
        </interface>
        <interface id="IF-002" name="Personal Dashboard Interface" type="UI">
            <description>Personalized dashboard displaying AI-powered workload insights and task prioritization</description>
            <purpose>Provide users with intelligent task prioritization and workload management tools</purpose>
            <specifications>AI Insights widget with prioritized tasks, workload capacity indicator with visual gauge, task list with quick actions, productivity metrics display, notification center, navigation menu</specifications>
            <interactions>User views prioritized tasks, user clicks tasks for details, user interacts with capacity indicators, user dismisses notifications, user navigates between projects</interactions>
            <accessibility>Responsive design for mobile/tablet/desktop, ARIA labels for screen readers, focus management, color contrast compliance, resizable text support</accessibility>
        </interface>
        <interface id="IF-003" name="Real-Time Collaboration Interface" type="UI">
            <description>Task detail view supporting real-time collaboration among multiple users</description>
            <purpose>Enable seamless real-time collaboration on task details and updates</purpose>
            <specifications>Task header with status and assignee, real-time comment thread with user avatars, file attachment area with preview, activity feed showing live updates, user presence indicators, conflict resolution dialogs</specifications>
            <interactions>Multiple users view/edit simultaneously, comments appear in real-time, file uploads sync instantly, status changes broadcast immediately, presence indicators show active users</interactions>
            <accessibility>Live region announcements for screen readers, keyboard shortcuts for common actions, focus management during updates, clear visual indicators for changes</accessibility>
        </interface>
        <interface id="IF-004" name="OAuth 2.0 Authentication Interface" type="UI">
            <description>Login interface supporting SSO through OAuth 2.0 identity providers</description>
            <purpose>Provide secure, frictionless authentication through external identity providers</purpose>
            <specifications>Login page with provider buttons (Google, Microsoft), corporate branding options, error message display, loading states during redirect, session timeout warnings</specifications>
            <interactions>User clicks provider button, user redirected to provider, user authenticates externally, user returned to application, session established</interactions>
            <accessibility>Clear button labels and descriptions, error messages accessible to screen readers, focus management during redirects, alternative login options</accessibility>
        </interface>
        <interface id="IF-005" name="Project Reports API" type="API">
            <description>RESTful API endpoint for accessing project reports and analytics data</description>
            <purpose>Enable programmatic access to project data for integration with BI tools and custom applications</purpose>
            <specifications>GET /api/v1/projects/{projectId}/reports endpoint, OAuth 2.0 Bearer token authentication, query parameters for filtering (startDate, endDate, groupBy), JSON response format, OpenAPI 3.0 documentation</specifications>
            <interactions>Client authenticates with bearer token, client makes GET request with parameters, server validates and processes, server returns JSON response, client handles response</interactions>
            <accessibility>API documentation available, rate limiting headers included, error responses with clear messages, CORS configuration for web clients</accessibility>
        </interface>
        <interface id="IF-006" name="Project Health Dashboard" type="UI">
            <description>Project manager dashboard displaying AI-generated health summaries and insights</description>
            <purpose>Provide project managers with actionable insights into project health and risks</description>
            <specifications>AI Health Summary widget with narrative text, risk indicators with severity levels, recommendation cards with action buttons, visual charts for trends, key metrics display, drill-down capabilities</specifications>
            <interactions>Manager views health summary, manager clicks risks for details, manager acts on recommendations, manager drills down into underlying data, manager exports reports</interactions>
            <accessibility>Data tables with headers, chart descriptions for screen readers, keyboard navigation for interactive elements, color-blind friendly palettes</accessibility>
        </interface>
    </interfaceRequirements>

    <performanceRequirements>
        <requirement id="PR-001" name="Natural Language Processing Response Time" priority="High">
            <description>AI-powered natural language processing for task creation must respond quickly to maintain user flow</description>
            <metric>Response time for parsing and suggestions</metric>
            <target>Less than 500ms for 95% of requests</target>
            <measurement>Monitor API response times, track percentile metrics, log processing durations</measurement>
            <conditions>Under normal load with AI model available, typical input length (50-200 characters)</conditions>
        </requirement>
        <requirement id="PR-002" name="Real-Time Collaboration Latency" priority="High">
            <description>Real-time updates must be delivered with minimal latency for effective collaboration</description>
            <metric>End-to-end message delivery time</metric>
            <target>Less than 100ms for 90% of updates</target>
            <measurement>WebSocket message timestamps, client-side receive times, network latency monitoring</measurement>
            <conditions>Multiple users actively collaborating, stable network connections, typical message sizes</conditions>
        </requirement>
        <requirement id="PR-003" name="Dashboard Load Performance" priority="High">
            <description>Personal and project dashboards must load quickly with AI-generated insights</description>
            <metric>Page load time to interactive</metric>
            <target>Less than 2 seconds for initial load, less than 1 second for subsequent loads</target>
            <measurement>Browser performance metrics, server response times, database query performance</measurement>
            <conditions>Normal user load, cached data available, AI processing completed</conditions>
        </requirement>
        <requirement id="PR-004" name="API Response Time" priority="Medium">
            <description>REST API endpoints must respond quickly for integration with external systems</description>
            <metric>API response time for report generation</metric>
            <target>Less than 3 seconds for 95% of requests</target>
            <measurement>API gateway metrics, database query performance, response size monitoring</measurement>
            <conditions>Typical report queries, standard date ranges (30-90 days), normal database load</conditions>
        </requirement>
        <requirement id="PR-005" name="Concurrent User Support" priority="High">
            <description>System must support multiple concurrent users with real-time collaboration</description>
            <metric>Concurrent active users per project</metric>
            <target>Support 100+ concurrent users per project without degradation</target>
            <measurement>Active WebSocket connections, server resource utilization, response time monitoring</measurement>
            <conditions>Peak usage periods, multiple projects active, real-time features enabled</conditions>
        </requirement>
        <requirement id="PR-006" name="Database Query Performance" priority="High">
            <description>Database queries must perform efficiently to support real-time features</description>
            <metric>Query response time for complex operations</metric>
            <target>Less than 200ms for 95% of queries</target>
            <measurement>Database query logs, execution plan analysis, index usage monitoring</measurement>
            <conditions>Typical query patterns, normal data volumes, appropriate indexing in place</conditions>
        </requirement>
    </performanceRequirements>

    <securityRequirements>
        <requirement id="SR-001" name="OAuth 2.0 Authentication Security" priority="High">
            <description>Secure implementation of OAuth 2.0 for SSO authentication</description>
            <type>Authentication, Authorization</type>
            <specifications>Use PKCE for public clients, validate state parameter to prevent CSRF, securely store client secrets, implement token revocation, use HTTPS for all redirects, validate ID tokens, implement token expiration and refresh</specifications>
            <compliance>OAuth 2.0 Security Best Practices, RFC 6749, RFC 7636, OWASP Authentication Cheat Sheet</compliance>
        </requirement>
        <requirement id="SR-002" name="API Security" priority="High">
            <description>Secure REST API with proper authentication and authorization</description>
            <type>Authentication, Authorization, Encryption</type>
            <specifications>Bearer token authentication, OAuth 2.0 scope validation, rate limiting per client, input validation and sanitization, HTTPS enforcement, CORS configuration, API key management, request signing for sensitive operations</specifications>
            <compliance>OWASP API Security Top 10, RFC 6750, NIST SP 800-63</compliance>
        </requirement>
        <requirement id="SR-003" name="Data Encryption" priority="High">
            <description>Encryption of sensitive data at rest and in transit</description>
            <type>Encryption</type>
            <specifications>TLS 1.3 for all network communications, AES-256 encryption for sensitive data at rest, encrypted database fields for PII, key rotation procedures, secure key management service integration, encrypted backups</specifications>
            <compliance>GDPR Article 32, CCPA, ISO 27001, NIST SP 800-53</compliance>
        </requirement>
        <requirement id="SR-004" name="Access Control" priority="High">
            <description>Role-based access control with principle of least privilege</description>
            <type>Authorization</type>
            <specifications>Role-based permissions (Admin, Manager, Member, Viewer), project-level access control, resource-level permissions, permission inheritance, audit logging for access attempts, regular permission reviews</specifications>
            <compliance>OWASP Authorization Cheat Sheet, NIST SP 800-53 AC-3</compliance>
        </requirement>
        <requirement id="SR-005" name="Session Security" priority="High">
            <description>Secure session management to prevent session hijacking</description>
            <type>Session Management</type>
            <specifications>Secure, HttpOnly cookies, session timeout configuration, session invalidation on logout, concurrent session limits, session fixation prevention, secure session storage, CSRF protection</specifications>
            <compliance>OWASP Session Management Cheat Sheet, OWASP CSRF Prevention Cheat Sheet</compliance>
        </requirement>
        <requirement id="SR-006" name="Input Validation and Sanitization" priority="High">
            <description>Comprehensive input validation to prevent injection attacks</description>
            <type>Input Validation</type>
            <specifications>Server-side validation for all inputs, SQL parameterization, XSS prevention, file upload validation, input length limits, whitelist validation, output encoding, content security policy</specifications>
            <compliance>OWASP Input Validation Cheat Sheet, OWASP XSS Prevention Cheat Sheet</compliance>
        </requirement>
    </securityRequirements>

    <errorHandling>
        <scenario id="EH-001" name="AI Processing Unavailable">
            <description>AI services become unavailable during task creation or analysis</description>
            <trigger>AI model service timeout, API rate limits exceeded, model deployment failure</trigger>
            <detection>Health check failures, API timeout errors, service discovery failures</detection>
            <response>Display user-friendly message about AI being temporarily unavailable, fall back to manual task creation, cache recent AI responses for reuse, retry mechanism with exponential backoff</response>
            <recovery>Monitor service health, automatically retry when service restored, clear cache when service returns, log incidents for analysis</recovery>
            <logging>Error codes logged, user impact tracked, retry attempts recorded, service health metrics updated</logging>
        </scenario>
        <scenario id="EH-002" name="Real-Time Sync Failure">
            <description>WebSocket connection fails or message synchronization errors occur</description>
            <trigger>Network connectivity loss, WebSocket server restart, message serialization errors</trigger>
            <detection>WebSocket close events, message delivery failures, client-side connection status monitoring</detection>
            <response>Queue changes locally, display connection status indicator, attempt automatic reconnection, merge changes when reconnected, show conflict resolution UI if needed</response>
            <recovery>Implement exponential backoff reconnection, resolve conflicts using last-write-wins or user selection, sync queued changes, clear local queue after successful sync</recovery>
            <logging>Connection events logged, queued changes tracked, conflict resolutions recorded, reconnection attempts monitored</logging>
        </scenario>
        <scenario id="EH-003" name="Authentication Failure">
            <description>OAuth 2.0 authentication fails or tokens become invalid</description>
            <trigger>Expired tokens, revoked access, identity provider outage, invalid client configuration</trigger>
            <detection>401 Unauthorized responses, token validation failures, OAuth error responses</detection>
            <response>Redirect to login page, display clear error message, offer alternative login methods, clear invalid session data, attempt token refresh if applicable</response>
            <recovery>Initiate new OAuth flow, refresh tokens if possible, update client configuration if needed, monitor provider status</recovery>
            <logging>Authentication failures logged, error codes tracked, provider status monitored, user session events recorded</logging>
        </scenario>
        <scenario id="EH-004" name="Database Connection Error">
            <description>Database becomes unavailable or connection issues occur</description>
            <trigger>Database server downtime, connection pool exhaustion, network issues to database</trigger>
            <detection>Connection timeout errors, query failures, health check failures</detection>
            <response>Display service unavailable message, implement circuit breaker pattern, serve cached data where possible, queue write operations for later processing</response>
            <recovery>Attempt reconnection with backoff, process queued operations when database returns, clear circuit breaker when healthy, verify data integrity after recovery</recovery>
            <logging>Database errors logged, connection pool status monitored, queued operations tracked, recovery events recorded</logging>
        </scenario>
        <scenario id="EH-005" name="API Rate Limit Exceeded">
            <description>API rate limits are exceeded for internal or external services</description>
            <trigger>High request volume, abusive usage patterns, misconfigured rate limits</trigger>
            <detection>429 Too Many Requests responses, rate limit headers, monitoring alerts</detection>
            <response>Return 429 with Retry-After header, implement client-side rate limiting, queue non-critical requests, provide user feedback for delays</response>
            <recovery>Implement exponential backoff for retries, distribute load across multiple instances, adjust rate limits based on capacity, monitor usage patterns</recovery>
            <logging>Rate limit events logged, client identification tracked, retry attempts recorded, capacity metrics monitored</logging>
        </scenario>
